title: New: Youth Lagoon – Worms
content:
Featuring samples from the Rings of Uranus, Youth Lagoon’s new track Worms forms part of a new compilation set to be released by Lefse Records, showcasing a host of artists using unique sound recordings from space to aid their own compositions.

Vocally, it maintains the raw, emotionally driven edge that characterised both his debut album and 2013’s Year Of Hibernation, building upon the development of a sonic theme, there’s moments where Worms could have stepped directly from Magical Mystery Tour or The Rise and Fall of Ziggy Stardust and The Spiders From Mars, and that’s entirely a good thing.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
